azurerm_subnet_route_table_association.description: Associates a [Route Table](route_table.html) with a [Subnet](subnet.html) within a [Virtual Network](virtual_network.html).

route_table_id.description: The ID of the Route Table which should be associated with the Subnet. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

subnet_id.description: The ID of the Subnet. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

create.description: Used when creating the Subnet Route Table Association.

update.description: Used when updating the Subnet Route Table Association.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Subnet Route Table Association.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Subnet Route Table Association.
